Function Details [hide private]

Categor(x, hist)

 

Categorical Log-likelihood generalization of a Bernoulli process for variables with any constant number of discrete values. x: data vector (list) hist: tuple (prob,classes) classes contain the superior limit of the histogram classes >>> Categor([1],([.3,.7],[0,1])) -0.356674943939
